meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of gneiss.
meanings.sent1: The gneissic rocks in the area are known for their distinct layers.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a gneissic appearance, with bands of different minerals.
meanings.sent3: The gneissic patterns in the stone made it look like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as complex and layered as a gneissic rock formation.
meanings.sent5: The gneissic texture of the wall felt rough and smooth at the same time.

meanings.sent1: The artist's painting had a gneissic quality, showing depth and strength.
meanings.sent2: The gneissic structure of the building made it sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a gneissic taste, combining sweet and salty flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a gneissic resonance, echoing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The gneissic nature of his character shone through in times of adversity.

meanings.definition: Resembling gneiss in appearance or composition.
meanings.sent1: The fabric had a gneissic look, with streaks of different colors.
meanings.sent2: The new building material was gneissic, mimicking the strength of gneiss.
meanings.sent3: The gneissic design of the garden blended well with the natural surroundings.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a gneissic sparkle, reflecting different emotions.
meanings.sent5: The gneissic pattern on the floor tiles added a touch of elegance to the room.
